abstract_ssm: One oversize bound volume used as an account book in relation to various services and necessities, including public utilities, equipment and supplies, construction, maintenance and repair, automobile parts, insurance, decoration, and others.  All accounts in the volume date from 1922.  The creator of the account book is not known, but an envelope filed toward the end of the volume suggests that it may have been used by Frank K. Lang of Middle Village, Long Island, N.Y.
